sentences.sContent: an abundant supply of fresh water
abundant opportunities for well qualified staff
sentences.sCn: 提供给高素质的员工的大量机会

sentences.sContent: ...even rural people will also get access to abundant and updated knowledge...
...natural resources of the world are abundant enough to meet the demand of human beings...
...there's abundant evidence that this isn't the case...

remMethod.val: a(无) ＋ bund(看作bound， 边界) ＋ ant(…的) → 多得没边的 → 丰富的

trans.tranCn: 丰富的， 富裕的； 大量的， 充足的
trans.tranOther: something that is abundant exists or is available in large quantities so that there is more than enough
